• Multiplayer mining game with real-time sync via MQTT broker
  • Procedurally generated 1000x2000 tile map with various ores and terrain
  • Upgrades, inventory, fuel management, and heat resistance mechanics
  • Mobile controls with D-pad and action buttons for touch devices
  • Save system with local IndexedDB storage and cloud sync via Puter

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players dig through procedurally generated terrain to find valuable ores. The game features real-time multiplayer through MQTT, upgrade systems, mobile controls, and persistent save functionality with cloud sync. Players can mine, build structures, trade resources, and explore an expansive underground world while managing fuel, hull integrity, and heat levels.
